body.name: Pipishell Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 26-60 inch Flat or Curved TVs up to 77 lbs, TV Bracket Wall Mount with Articulating Arms, Extension, Tilt, Swivel, Leveling, Max VESA 400x400mm, PIMF7
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 17 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral by Carbon Trust products reduce their carbon footprint year after year and any outstanding emissions are offset.

features: Solid & Reliable: Featuring strong construction with articulating arms that are 33% thicker than other mounts, this TV wall mount can support up to 77 lbs. Premium heavy-duty steel, durable faceplate, and security screws provide an extra sense of security.

Perfect Viewing Angle: The full motion TV mount can tilt +5°/-15° to reduce glare and swivels +/-90° to direct the screen toward your position for a more comfortable experience. Level the TV +/-4° after installation to perfectly fine tune the TV’s position.

Wide Compatibility: The Pipishell TV wall mount fits most 26"-60" TVs with VESA patterns 75x75mm up to 400x400mm. Compatible with wood stud, concrete, and brick wall mounting. Do not install the mount on drywall alone.

Space-Saving Design: This wall mount can extend 17" for viewing and retracts back to 2.36" for a low-profile look. The single-stud design is ideal for installing in spaces such as a corner or area where only one stud is available.

Quick & Simple Installation: The full motion TV wall mount includes mounting hardware and detailed instructions for fast installation. The single-stud design makes it easier to mount than dual arm models that require two studs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pipishell Full Motion TV Wall Mount | A Reliable TV Companion Featuring heavy-duty steel and thicker arms, the Pipishell PIMF7 full motion wall mount is a great choice for most 26"-60" flat or curved TVs up to 77 lbs. Tilt your screen +5°/-15° to reduce glare and swivel +/-90° to watch TV from any angle.
Previous page Next page 1 Purchase Tips 2 Fits TVs Size & Max Load 3 Compatiable TV Vesa Range 4 Installation Notes

The long 17" extension can help bring your TV closer for viewing, while the 2.36" low-profile retraction distance can give your room a streamlined look. The single-stud design makes this TV mount ideal for corner mounting with less work than a dual arm mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great product and fair priced
reviews.reviewText: product was terrific and installation was not bad at all had samsung and parts sent did the trick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was pretty easy to install. You will need to have another person to help, though. Seems to be well made and sturdy. I have a 42" LG smart TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Functions as intended. It is securely holding my 50" TV above my fireplace with a very small gap, when pushed all the way back. Installation was fairly straightforward, however, we had to get creative with the pieces that attach the TV to the bracket in order to attach at all 4 points. In the end, it holds securely and can be turned/angled, as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy for smaller TV's, easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Got a 43" and it works great, not sure how it'll do with larger TV's. Adjustments are easy, wish the tilt feature was more rotatable, but still better than most. Worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Went up with ease!
reviews.reviewText: I have installed plenty of TV wall mounts, and this one was a breeze to install. I used this one to install an older, kinda heavy (compared to most TVs today) non smart TV and it performs very well. This has so many available configurations and it came with quite a few different mounting bolts that I am sure would fit whatever type of TV set that I have. The motion is great and easy to move without any struggles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price, works well
reviews.reviewText: More than adequate for our 50" tv. Good quality, reasonable price. Instructions on. Make sure to get at least one side of plate into a stud. I am a conservative diy-er & don't trust Molly's when it comes to TV's that can be accidentally hit or walked into

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to mount
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were very easy to understand and this mount was perfect for one person to mount. Good size, good swivel motion. However, you do have to adjust the bolts in the back for it to go up and down. Or adjust them the other way for it to go side to side it does not go 360 off of one adjustment. You have to keep changing them back-and-forth.My son keeps his TV side to side while I’d rather keep mine up and down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small mount
reviews.reviewText: I already had a mount for our tv but the studs were too far apart to use it. I was worried our older, heavier tv might be too much for this small mount in one stud but that was wrong. It went up really easy and is very sturdy. Also the full range of motion on this is great especially for the price.

This mount seems to be sturdy and well made. It comes with all of the hardware you need to adapt to a wide variety of flat screen TVs.I used it on a 32" and it's perfect. It's easy to install. You will need a variety of socket sizes and a drill.I like the range of motion this mount provides. It tilts, and moves side to side with no hesitation.I highly recommend it. I will not hesitate to purchase in the future if needed.
Easy to mount with excellent instructions. Is very heavy duty. This allows my tv to be moved in all directions. It's exactly what I was looking for and incredibly priced. 5 stars!!!!! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

This mount is well made and comes with all the hardware you need to adapt to a wide variety of flat screen TVs. I used it on a 42" and it is more than sturdy enough.If you read the instructions carefully and review the pictures closely, it's an easy install. You will need a variety of socket sizes and a drill.I'd buy this mount again if needed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not a one person set up
reviews.reviewText: Need multiple people to help with setting it up but it was super easy to do. My TV fit the brackets perfectly so I didn't have to screw anything extra into the back. Holds my 55in TV up without issue.

Works very well. I love that it’s super adjustable. It was easy to install by myself (female). Tons of extra screws to accommodate for almost any TV. I had ordered and installed a second one because of how great it was. Can’t beat the price point either
